summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Neighborhood Parks, Green Spaces, Trails, and Zoo Levy; authorizing the acquisition of real property commonly known as Fremont Peak Park, Ballard-17th NW Open Space, and Mt. Baker Ridge; authorizing acceptance of the deeds for open space, park, and recreation purposes; and increasing appropriations from the 2000 Parks Levy Fund in the 2002 Budget of the Department of Parks and Recreation; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
